Request to Delete Your User Data

We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information

If you have uninstalled our app and would like to request deletion of your user data, please complete the form below.

Note: We may contact you to verify your identity before processing the request.

This request is handled in accordance with applicable data privacy laws, including the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA).

Once submitted, your data will be reviewed and permanently deleted from our systems within the legally required timeframe.
